OCD.name: Logical Operators for Wires
OCD.description: A component which allows to perform logical operations on Wires.

AD.name: Operator
AD.description: Specifies the logical operation to be executed by the component

AD.name: First Operand
AD.description: Specifies the name of the operand property in the envelope received on the first port.

AD.name: Second Operand
AD.description: Specifies the name of the operand property in the envelope received on the second port. Will be ignored if the operation is NOT.

AD.name: Result Name
AD.description: Specifies the name of the result property in the emitted envelope.

AD.name: Barrier
AD.description: Specifies if the component should use a barrier for input ports or perform caching of messages;ignored by NOT operator
